void transformDepthImageToPointCloud (IplImage *depthImage, PointCloud3D *pointCloud, double threshold=0.0)
 Transforms a depth image into a point cloud.

Detailed Description

Transforms a depth image into a point cloud.

Point cloud frame:

z    y
^   ^
|  /
| /
|/
+--------> x

Member Function Documentation

void brics_3d::DepthImageToPointCloudTransformation::transformDepthImageToPointCloud ( IplImage *  depthImage,
PointCloud3D *  pointCloud,
double  threshold = 0.0 
)

Transforms a depth image into a point cloud.

Parameters:
[in]depthImageInput pointer to depth image
[out]pointCloudOutput pointer to point cloud
thresholdThreshold where to cut off background pixels. Only pixels greater or equal than this threshold are taken Default is 0.0, that means all pixels are taken

TODO: camera is not calibrated!!!

Implicit assumptions:

1.) point cloud is in camera frame

2.) image is in gray scale and 8bit

3.) brighter regions appears nearer to camera
